com.futurice.cascade.i

Interface IOnErrorAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBaseAction<Exception>

    public interface IOnErrorAction
extends IBaseAction<Exception>
    A function to run in the event of an Exception or similar irregular termination such as ICancellable.cancel(String) Perform some cleanup or notification mOnFireAction to bring this object into a rest state after irregular termination.
